title: USB Safely Remove 5.2.4.1215 RePack by D!akov
description:
USB Safely Remove is a reliable and convenient replacement of 'Safely Remove Hardware'. Guarantees the safety of your data when you stop the device and allows you to stop the process as convenient and customizable. Stopping menu will now show only those devices that you really need. The name of any device can be easily changed - to make it as simple or as detailed as possible vice versa. In most cases, USB Safely Remove assigns meaningful names automatically. For the device, you can assign a beautiful standard icon or download from your disk. 

Key features: 
Hiding any device from stop menu 
Device names + renaming 
Hotkeys for tripping 
Easy to use menus to disable just one click 
Startup programs when connecting / disconnecting 
Forced device stop

Installation Notes:
-------------------
1. Uninstall previous version of USB Safely Remove if any.

2. Install the "USBSafelyRemove-5.2.4.1215.exe" application with admin privileges by selecting "Run as Administrator" (Right-click on the exe file before launching)

3. Pay attention to the installation dialog and select the user interface language as desired. (Default: Russian)

4. Run the .cmd file as Admin for the desired UI language (Example: For English, run ENG.cmd as ADMIN)
